error.value0.single.notValid: Value can't be 0 or lower for 'LOWER THAN' constraint, provide a positive number
label.goal.summary.single: The goal will be considered reached if the metric measured at the measurement timestamp
info.metric: Pick the kind of DefiLlama-sourced metric you want to track.
info.constraint.type: Pick the kind of constraint you want to be applied to the tracked metric you've picked above to determine if your goal was reached or not.
info.timestamp: This is the timestamp at which the measurement over the picked metric will be taken and used to finalize the oracle.
